subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Simona de Silvestro said a wreck during practice for the Indy 500 made her reconsider her future, but she said knows she wants to stay in racing.
snippet: Simona de Silvestro said a wreck during practice for the Indy 500 made her reconsider her future, but she said knows she wants to stay in racing.
